query.description: A non-empty list of pseudonym identifier(s) corresponding to vehicle(s).

items.description: A query record with trustee identifier and claims.

trusteeIDs.description: This identifier corresponds to the pseudonym associated with an ego vehicle.

timestamp.description: Request creation date in UTC. To be provided by the MBD crypto library.

nonce.description: Challenge in HEX format. To be provided by the MBD crypto library.

signatureAlgorithmType.description: Signing algorithm. To be provided by the MBD crypto library.

signature.description: Signature of the query structure and the rest of the evidence attributes. To be provided by the MBD crypto library.

keyRef.description: Identifier to the public key associated with the MBD component. To be provided by the MBD crypto library.
